bug.summary: broken link of pai wiki maintain machine & service

comments.comment: can we use broken link checker for wiki too?
not sure, previous broken link checker seems only could check path inner repo, not check web url.
if it can check will be helpful
The project web site is stored in gh-page branch, I think maybe wiki is also stored in git repo, maybe some branch.
